pages.text: An old rifle. Send musket balls over long distances at high speed to damage opponents from afar. Musket balls experience less drop when fired from a musket.$(br2)The musket excels in long-range combat, but is generally unsuitable for closer targets due to its high reload time.
Chances are you'll have trouble targeting an opponent from a distance. You can attach a spyglass to your musket to allow scoping in on targets.
